{% extends "templates/item_page.html" %} {% set namespaces = "cmoon" %} {% set library_name = "Concepts" %} {% set item_name = "unary_operator" %} {% block nested %}../{% endblock %} {% block content2 %} {{macros.defined("cmoon.concepts", github_url_src + "/concepts/concepts.ixx")}} {{macros.overload_set([ " template concept unary_operator = std::is_invocable_r; " ])}}

The concept unary_operator<F, Result> is satisfied if and only if F is invocable given the type Result and returning the type Result.
